Harry Markopolos waged a remarkable battle to uncover fraud at Bernard Madoff 's operation, sounding the alarm back in 1999 and continuing with his warnings all through this decade. the government never acted, Bernard Madoff continued his ways, and people lost billions. Harry Markopolos reached his conclusion with the help of mathematicians like dan dibartolomeo, whose analysis of the Bernard Madoff 's methods in 1999 helped fuel Harry Markopolos ' suspicions. people should have seen the writing on the wall, "dibartolomeo said.
